Question & Options:
Which of the following statements about the movie 'Inglourious Basterds' (2009) and its connection to spaghetti westerns are true?
Options:
A. Quentin Tarantino considers 'Inglourious Basterds' a 'bunch-of-guys-on-a-mission' film.
B. The movie is set in the traditional western genre.
C. Tarantino compared 'Inglourious Basterds' to spaghetti westerns.
D. Spaghetti westerns were a major influence on the film's storytelling.
Correct Answer: Quentin Tarantino considers 'Inglourious Basterds' a 'bunch-of-guys-on-a-mission' film., Tarantino compared 'Inglourious Basterds' to spaghetti westerns., Spaghetti westerns were a major influence on the film's storytelling.
